backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing songs, personal songs, and user profiles with access control, upload functions, and profile retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping UI/UX changes to specific frontend files and components with high‑confidence feature IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files describing layout, hooks, pages, and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables defining dark-theme surfaces and sidebar tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file mounting the root React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes, wraps the app in a dark ThemeProvider, and includes global toasts.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Protects admin routes by requiring Internet Identity login and admin status with clear UI states.
frontend/src/components/admin/SongEditor: Dialog for creating or editing songs with metadata fields, file upload handling, and normalized progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/catalog/CatalogS: Renders a responsive row card for a song with play, cover image, metadata, duration, and download controls.
frontend/src/components/catalog/Download: Provides a download button that checks authentication and subscription status and downloads audio via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/catalog/PublicSo: Implements a dialog for uploading public songs with form fields, file handling, progress tracking, and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/home/HorizontalS: Creates a horizontally scrollable, snap-aligned row wrapper for child elements.
frontend/src/components/home/StreamingCa: Displays a song card with cover art, play overlay, and basic song info, handling play interactions and playing indicator.
frontend/src/components/home/StreamingSe: Renders a titled section with optional icon and 'Show all' button, wrapping provided content.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main application layout with authentication handling, sidebars, header buttons, outlet rendering, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderSea: Provides a search bar with home navigation, query handling, and a browse menu with keyboard and outside-click support.
frontend/src/components/layout/HomeTabBa: Shows tab buttons for home browsing that update the active tab via context.
frontend/src/components/layout/LeftSideb: Renders the left sidebar with navigation buttons and a library section, conditionally showing an admin link based on user status.
frontend/src/components/layout/RightDeta: Displays details and artwork for the currently playing song, or a placeholder when nothing is playing.
frontend/src/components/personal/Persona: Provides a dialog for authenticated users to upload personal songs with metadata, audio, and optional cover images, tracking upload progress.
frontend/src/components/player/AudioPlay: Implements the bottom audio player bar, handling playback, seeking, volume, mute, and loading streamed audio for catalog or personal songs.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Shows a required onboarding dialog for new authenticated users to provide a name and subscription status before using the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioQueue.ts: Manages the audio queue state using Zustand, including playback control, navigation, timing, and queue modification.
frontend/src/hooks/useHeaderSearch.ts: Stores and updates the header search query using a simple Zustand state.
frontend/src/hooks/useHomeBrowsing.ts: Tracks home browsing UI state such as active tab and scroll requests via Zustand.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status management. Wraps AuthClient creation with custom options and exposes a hook for accessing identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating song data, user profiles, admin checks, and uploading songs via an actor interface. Handles cache invalidation and authorization error messaging.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom light/dark theme variables and utility classes for scroll behavior and snap layouts. Sets global styling for background, borders, and typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider. Loads global styles and renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin interface for viewing, uploading, editing, and deleting songs with dialogs and UI components. Fetches song data and handles CRUD operations with visual feedback.
frontend/src/pages/LibraryPage.tsx: User-facing library page that lists, filters, recommends, and plays songs, with sections for browsing and uploading public songs. Integrates audio queue, search, and home browsing state.
frontend/src/pages/MyLibraryPage.tsx: Displays the authenticated user's personal song library with filtering, playback, upload, and delete actions. Redirects unauthenticated users to log in via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Renders a pricing page with a free trial card and plan cards, mapping plan data into styled UI components. Includes badges, buttons, and layout styling for weekly, monthly, and yearly plans.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based routing parameters. Includes helpers to persist, retrieve, and clear parameters safely.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, shadows, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations. Extends theme settings for a styled dark UI.
project_state.json: Describes current project state and features focused on building a Spotify-style three‑panel layout with gradient headers, tracklists, and responsive behavior.
